Public Interface
className classType txAbsPeer
~txAbsPeer setType getType
refCount activate deactivate
isActive hash getId
clone equals

Public Interface

enum TYPE

NONE=0
TCP=1
UDP=2
virtual const char* className( ) const;
virtual const txString& classType( ) const;
txAbsPeer( ) ;
virtual ~txAbsPeer( ) ;
virtual void setType( txAbsPeer::TYPE type ) = 0;
virtual TYPE getType( ) const = 0;
virtual int refCount( ) const = 0;
virtual void activate( ) = 0;
virtual void deactivate( ) = 0;
virtual int isActive( ) const = 0;
virtual unsigned hash( ) const = 0;
virtual const char* getId( ) const = 0;
virtual txAbsPeer* clone( ) const = 0;
virtual int equals( const txObject* ) const = 0;

class txAbsServer

#include "txabssrvr.h"

Public Interface
txAbsServer ~txAbsServer contact
sendTo sendTo recvFrom
broadcast multicast registerContactEstablished
registerContactLost unregisterContactEstablished unregisterContactLost
close close

Public Interface

enum STATUS

INITIAL
SHUTDOWN
txAbsServer( int priority = 0 ) ;
virtual ~txAbsServer( ) ;
virtual int contact( const txAbsPeer& ) = 0;
virtual int sendTo( txNetworkMsg* ) = 0;
virtual int sendTo( const char* , unsigned long , const txAbsPeer& ) = 0;
virtual int recvFrom( txNetworkMsgs& , int num_of_p = 0 ) = 0;
virtual int broadcast( const char* , unsigned long ) = 0;
virtual int multicast( const char* , unsigned long , const txPeerList& ) = 0;
virtual void registerContactEstablished( const TX_COMM_FUNC func , void* context ) ;
virtual void registerContactLost( const TX_COMM_FUNC func , void* context ) ;
virtual void unregisterContactEstablished( ) ;
virtual void unregisterContactLost( ) ;
virtual void close( const txAbsPeer& peer ) = 0;
virtual void close( ) = 0;

class txSocket : public txObject

#include "txsocket.h"

Public Interface
txSocket txSocket ~txSocket
fd port close
netaddr port listen
bind bind connect
send send recv
sendTo sendTo recvFrom
registerContactEstablished registerContactLost unregisterContactEstablished
unregisterContactLost generateLocalNetAddr generateIp
generateIp generateNetAddr generateLocalIp

Public Interface

enum SECURITY

ON
OFF

enum TYPE

IN_BAND
OUT_OF_BAND
txSocket( int type , int priority = SOCKET_THRD_PRIORITY ) ;
txSocket( int type , txAbsPacker* packer , int priority = SOCKET_THRD_PRIORITY ) ;
~txSocket( ) ;
int fd( ) ;
int port( ) ;
int close( ) ;
unsigned long netaddr( ) ;
void port( int port ) ;
int listen( int connections = 1 ) ;
int bind( int port ) ;
int bind( unsigned long netaddr , int port ) ;
int connect( unsigned long netaddr , int port ) ;
int send( txNetworkMsg* packet ) ;
int send( const char* stream , int streamlength ) ;
int recv( txNetworkMsgs& packets , int num = 0 , unsigned long time = 0 ) ;
int sendTo( txNetworkMsg* packet ) ;
int sendTo( const char* data , int len , unsigned long ntddr , int port ) ;
char* recvFrom( int s , int& l , unsigned long& net , int& port ) ;
void registerContactEstablished( const TX_SOCKET_FUNC func , void* args ) ;
void registerContactLost( const TX_SOCKET_FUNC func , void* args ) ;
void unregisterContactEstablished( ) ;
void unregisterContactLost( ) ;
static unsigned long generateLocalNetAddr( txSocket::TYPE type ) ;
static int generateIp( unsigned long netaddr , char* ip ) ;
static int generateIp( const char* machine , char* ip ) ;
static unsigned long generateNetAddr( const char* machine ) ;
static int generateLocalIp( txSocket::TYPE type , char* ip ) ;

Public Data

static const int SOCKET_THRD_PRIORITY;
